Articles.Content:
After months of lurking I finally decided to join. Saw KSP on steam the day it came out and bought it instantly after seeing the screenshots. This is honestly the game I have been looking for for years. I'm actually irked all those google searches I made never led me to this game, but better late then never.

Of course this game and me have an unhealthy relationship. Not as unhealthy as some people and games as my girlfriend provides a certain level of entertainment this game can't. But unhealthy as in when we're not doing something or I'm not at work this game all the time for over two months straight now. I honestly might have more hours in than some people who have ben playing since day one. I wonder if that counts as an addiction?
